import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useQuery } from 'react-query'; import { medicinesAPI } from '../services/api'; import { Pill, Search, Plus, Edit, Trash2, Eye } from 'lucide-react'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; const Medicines = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); const [selectedMedicine, setSelectedMedicine] = useState(null); const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const { data: medicinesData, isLoading, refetch } = useQuery( ['medicines', currentPage, searchTerm], () => medicinesAPI.getMedicines(currentPage, searchTerm), { keepPreviousData: true, } ); const handleViewMedicine = (medicine) => { setSelectedMedicine(medicine); setShowModal(true); }; const handleStatusChange = async (medicineId, newStatus) => { try { await medicinesAPI.updateMedicine(medicineId, { medicineStatus: newStatus }); toast.success('Medicine status updated successfully'); refetch(); } catch (error) { toast.error('Failed to update medicine status'); } }; if (isLoading) { return (
); } return (
{/* Header */}

Manage all medicines in the database

{medicinesData?.pagination?.total || 0}

Active Medicines

{medicinesData?.medicines?.filter(m => m.medicineStatus === 1).length || 0}

Inactive Medicines

{medicinesData?.medicines?.filter(m => m.medicineStatus === 0).length || 0}

This Month

{medicinesData?.medicines?.length || 0}

{/* Search Bar */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="input pl-10 w-full" />
{/* Medicines Table */}

{medicine.medicineUses}
{medicine.medicineSideEffects}
{medicine.medicineStatus === 1 ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'}
{/* Pagination */} {medicinesData?.total > 10 && (

Showing {((currentPage - 1) * 10) + 1} to {Math.min(currentPage * 10, medicinesData.total)} of {medicinesData.total} medicines

)}
{/* Medicine Details Modal */} {showModal && selectedMedicine && (

Medicine Details

{selectedMedicine.medicineName}

{selectedMedicine.medicineUses}

{selectedMedicine.medicineSideEffects}

{selectedMedicine.medicineAlternatives}

{selectedMedicine.medicineStatus === 1 ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'}

{selectedMedicine.updatedDate}

)}
); }; export default Medicines;
